title: Task 72

answers.answer: She thinks it is essential that everyone read the same page on the documentation
answers.feedback: Remember that to be on the same page has a different meaning, not related to pages on a document.

answers.answer: She believes it is essential that every project have the amount allocated for the budget
answers.feedback: Her comment has more to do with a common understanding of the situation.

answers.answer: She is sure that everyone working in the project has to love some sport
answers.feedback: Sports were used only as an example for the expression in this challenge.

answers.answer: For her, it is essential that everyone have a common understanding of the project details

dialogue.text: It's essential that we're on the same page when it comes to project details.

description: When it comes to means when talking about a specific topic. For example, when discussing your favorite hobbies, you might say, When it comes to sports, I love soccer. It means when you are talking about that particular subject.
